description: The proposed installation comprises of the upgrade to existing rooftop telecommunications equipment.  Proposed 2No. Apertures to be mounted on new Valmont tripod.  Tripod to be installed on new R.C plinths bearing onto support columns below.  Proposed RRU's, BOBs and routers mounted on new support poles fixed inside tripod.  Proposed 2No. Apertures to be mounted on existing tripod.  Tripod mounted on existing R.C plinths bearing onto parapet wall above support columns below.  Proposed RRU's, BOBs  routers on new support poles fixed handrail behind tripod.  Proposed 2No. active antennas to be mounted on new H-frame installed on new freestanding frame.  Freestanding frame c/w open mesh decking, kickplate antenna access step  handrail.  Proposed BOBs mounted on new support poles fixed to steel frame.  Proposed 2No. Passive Antennas to be mounted new H-Frame on existing tripod.  TrIpod mounted on existing R.C plinths bearing onto parapet wall above support columns below.  Proposed 1No. EE and 1No. H3G GPS modules.  Proposed hooped access ladder to plantroom roof c/w 1100mm handrail, roof access platform and self closing gate. Proposed equipment cabinets to be installed on existing steel grillage.  Proposed large steel step-over.  Proposed 1100mm high freestanding handrail and associated Ancillary works.
